To estimate the total flavonoids, 125 µl of chloroformic fungal extract was mixed with 50 µl of sodium nitrate (5%) and 75 µl aluminium chloride (10%). The reaction mixture was allowed to stand for 6 min to which 250 µl of 1 M sodium hydroxide was added and further diluted with distilled water to make the volume 10 ml and mixed well. Absorbance was recorded at 510 nm against blank. Quercetin was used as a control
35, 38 .
